isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Service (1991) - INJECTION PUMP, NOZZLES, FUEL FILTER, SUPPLY PUMP AND GLOW PLUGS - FUEL FILTER/WATER SEPARATOR ASSEMBLY REMOVAL AND REASSEMBLY (U-Haul Application Only) - REASSEMBLY

step1.para: Install the filter base spacer (9) and filter base/header on the intake manifold mounting pad and fasten using two nuts with washers.
Install new rubber sealing rings and connect the filter to the injection pump tube (6) to the connector fitting (14) at the injection pump inlet and to the elbow (20) at the filter base.
Connect the fuel return hose (4) to the filter base (8) and the fuel return tee (16) using clips (5).

Connect the supply pump to filter base tube (11), using a new sealing ring (18) at the filter base elbow (10). Tighten the tube nut (19) and inverted flare tube nut (17). Attach the clamp (1) to the water pump bolt.
Install a new fuel filter/water separator (7) as follows:

step2.para:
Install a new drain bowl O-Ring (10, Figure 9.4
) at the drain bowl.
Coat the drain bowl O-Ring with clean fuel and install drain bowl to filter element (7), by hand, until O-Ring contacts, then turn an additional 1/2 turn.
Coat the gasket of the filter with clean fuel.
Tighten until the gasket touches the filter header.
Tighten the filter element an additional 1/2-3/4 turn.

step1.para: Connect the water drain tube (3) and hose (2) to the valve on the drain bowl. Fasten the drain tube at the valve cover and at the exhaust manifold.
Reconnect the electrical connectors at the water sensor, vacuum switch and heater probe.
The drain valve must be closed, tighten by turning clockwise (facing bottom of drain bowl) until a positive stop is felt.
Check for leaks after the engine has been started.
